div.h1:
Welcome to our Website
Enjoy Your Visit
div.p: The Murray Independent School District proudly proclaims a tradition of excellence that extends back almost a 150 years.

div.h1:
Murray City Schools
Successful for Every Student, Every Day
div.p: The Murray Independent School District is organized into an elementary school, a middle school, and a high school.
The Murray Independent School District athletic program provides many opportunities for its students.

div.h1:
Employment Opportunities
Be a Part of Our Team
div.p: Murray Independent School District is a community of leaders and learners. Our school district represents a great opportunity for educators to grow and develop professionally.

p.a: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest. -- Benjamin Frankin

p.strong: Successful for Every Student, Every Day

div.p: The Murray Independent School District is organized into an elementary school, a middle school, and a high school.
